translation.Hp_Sub_Title: Talented professionals making your home more beatiful and your life easier with various services
translation.Sub_One: Report the space that needs attention. Whether it's the living room, kitchen, bathroom, or bedrooms, we take care of every detail.
translation.Sub_Two: Choose from our options: general cleaning, nails, painting, sewing, and gardening. We tailor our services to meet your specific needs.
translation.Sub_Tree: Schedule your cleaning in just a few clicks! Choose the date and time that best fit your routine, and leave the rest to us.
translation.10_Discount: On your first quote, you GET a 10% DISCOUNT!
translation.Sub_RE: How about getting a discount while helping your friends keep their homes clean and organized? By referring our cleaning services, you and your referral will receive a 10% discount on your next service.
translation.RE_One: 1. Refer a friend who hasn't used our services yet.When they complete their first cleaning service, both of you will receive a 10% discount on your next cleaning!
translation.RE_Two: 2. It's an easy way to take care of your home and save money!
translation.RE_Tree: Contact us for more details and start referring today!
translation.Ft_SubTitle: We take care of your cleaning, you take care of your comfort!
